tool_description: Evaluates age-related medication risks and provides geriatric or pediatric-specific safety recommendations.

include_beers_criteria.description: Apply Beers Criteria for elderly patients

error_messages: Invalid age: Patient age must be between 0 and 150 years.
Medication not recognized: All medications must be valid drug names.
Age-specific data unavailable: Safety data for this age group is not available for some medications.
usage: Provide patient_age and medications list. The tool automatically applies pediatric or geriatric guidelines based on age.
